comments:
The new EE tests failed in the nightly build:


Missing EE file

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Missing EE file
at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.core.EEDefinitionTests.testValidateInstallLocation(EEDefinitionTests.java:46)
at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.AbstractDebugTest.runBare(AbstractDebugTest.java:1613)
at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.DebugSuite$1.run(DebugSuite.java:54)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:534)


The new test resources were not included in build.xml

Added new resource folder to build.xml (so test files will be in the build). As well, created new .ee file for win32 and non-win32 platforms, as the path separator has to be different within the file. Modified EE tests to load relevant .ee file based on platform.
